name: Singapore Laksa
recipeIngredient: 40 g fresh root ginger (peeled and chopped),
4 dried red chilies (soaked until soft and deseed),
225 g rice noodles or dried rice vermicelli (soaked in luke warm water until pliable),
Salt and freshly ground black pepper,
A small bunch of Vietnamese mint of fresh garden mint (roughly chopped),
recipeInstructions: 1.1 Put all the spice paste ingredients except the oil into a food processor and process.
1.2 Add the oil and process into a paste, then set aside.
2. Deep fry the shallots and set aside.
3. In a wok, fry the spice paste in a little oil on a low heat for 3-4 minutes.
4. Add the coconut milk and chicken stock and bring to the boil, stirring continually.
5. Add the prawns, squid, and scallops, and simmer gently for 5-10 minutes until cooked.
6. At the last minute add the cockles and season with salt and pepper.
10. Garnish with crispy shallots, mint, and a drizzle of chilli oil.
